name: 運動產業概論
description: This course is designed to help a student: 1) Understand the terminology within the leisure industry. 2) Understand a comprehensive sports industry in sports service. 3) Understand the components of sports management 4) Develop an awareness of the needs, opportunities and values of sports industry, with an understanding and appreciation for how and why people perceive and respond to varying sports resources and sport-based techniques. 5) Develop skills in application and evaluation of sports programming methods and techniques.
goals: 瞭解競技運動與運動產業的結合
瞭解討論與合作的重要性
培養學生對職場的認知
